h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (Second Encounter)
content: Head around the side of the temple after the Wise Master departs, and you can find a **Treasure Chest** around the side of the temple holding some materials.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (Second Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
Head around the side of the temple after the Wise Master departs, and you can find a **Treasure Chest** around the side of the temple holding some materials.
